content.prompt: Which of the following questions about cars in a school parking lot will allow for the collection of a set of categorical data?

choices.label: How many blue cars are in the lot?
What are the gas mileages, in miles per gallon, of the cars in the lot?
What are the weights, in pounds, of the cars in the lot?
What is the number of cars in the lot with out-of-state license plates?
What are the colors of the cars in the lot?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
